title: Barnhart Brothers ampersand problem
content:
I missed Paul Hunt’s August post on this problem and stumbled upon it myself. I submitted an entry for Barnhart Brothers & Spindler a while back and could still get to it doing a search, but none of the links to it worked. Evidently the ampersand is the problem and causes the name to truncate oddly. The fix is as follows:

barnhart\_brothers\_and\_spindler|Barnhart Brothers & Spindler

[Barnhart Brothers & Spindler](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013184638/http:/typophile.com/wiki/barnhart_brothers_and_spindler)
